body:
Comment 2: 
as you can see below, /usr/local was not installed by default. this machine got rebuilt
from CD around 06/05/2011.

iMac:~ tjyang$ ls -ld /usr/local/bin
drwxr-xr-x  2 root  wheel  68 Aug 31 07:49 /usr/local/bin
iMac:~ tjyang$ ls -ld /usr/local
drwxr-xr-x  4 root  wheel  136 Aug 31 07:49 /usr/local
iMac:~ tjyang$ ls -ld /usr
drwxr-xr-x@ 14 root  wheel  476 Jun  5 11:57 /usr
iMac:~ tjyang$
